title: This is the next-gen Motorola Razr
content:
Back in January, we exclusively reported what we believed to be the upcoming specifications of the Motorola Razr 3, internally codenamed “maven”. While we’ve known what to expect on the specifications side as a result, we weren’t so sure when it came to the design. Now, we’re getting our first look at both the device’s

The post This is the next-gen Motorola Razr appeared first on XDA.
description: We take our first look at Motorola's next-gen Razr, codenamed "maven". The upcoming handset is slated to arrive sometime in summer.
